document_data.mainbody:
Fong Moo was an infamous cutpurse from the cities of Baldurs Gate and Athkatla in the 14 century DR.
Several years before the , Fong Moos body was discovered along the Trade Way, between Baldurs Gate and Beregost, after stealing an artifact from a mage. The punishment for the crime came in the form of an angry spell-slinger. The thiefs possessions, including the gloves of pickpocketing, were passed along to Fongs nephew.
